translation.zh: 加油 莉齐！快跑！

translation.en: Good job, mate! All right, Johnno!
translation.zh: 好样的 伙计！ 好的 乔诺！

translation.en: Go! Whoo!
translation.zh: 加油！

translation.en: [Kezza] You got it!
translation.zh: 你成功了！

translation.en: All right, Shaz!
translation.zh: 好的 莎思！

translation.en: Yeah!
translation.zh: 耶！

translation.en: -Come on! -Come on, Tyler!
translation.zh: -加油！ -加油 泰勒！

translation.en: Let's go!
translation.zh: 加油！

translation.en: USA!
translation.zh: 美国队！

translation.en: Yes!
translation.zh: 太棒了！

translation.en: -I'm on your tail like a wallaby, mate. -[Tyler] What?
translation.zh: -伙计 我像个沙袋鼠一样紧跟着你 -什么？

translation.en: Tyler!
translation.zh: 泰勒！

translation.en: [announcer] It looks like an injury for Team USA!
translation.zh: 美国队好像受伤了！

translation.en: This is not good!
translation.zh: 情况不妙！

translation.en: Looks like Team USA won't even finish!
translation.zh: 看起来美国队连比赛都完成不了了！

translation.en: No!
translation.zh: 不！

translation.en: Tyler, come on!
translation.zh: 泰勒 快起来！

translation.en: -Tyler, get up! -You can do it!
translation.zh: -泰勒 起来！ -你能行！

translation.en: [Gina] Come on! Come on!
translation.zh: 加油！

translation.en: -Ha! Come on, brother. Up you get. -[Lizzie] Get up! Please!
translation.zh: -加油 老弟 快起来 -你快起来吧！

translation.en: [Dylan] Come on, Tyler!
translation.zh: 加油 泰勒！

translation.en: Go!
translation.zh: 起来！

translation.en: You got this!
translation.zh: 你能行！

translation.en: Let's go!
translation.zh: 加油！

translation.en: -[Dylan] Tyler! Come on! -[air horn blares]
translation.zh: 泰勒！起来！

translation.en: Team Australia decimates the competition by over a second!
translation.zh: 澳洲队以超过一秒的优势完胜！

translation.en: They've dethroned the US
translation.zh: 他们击败了卫冕的美国队

translation.en: and have become the new International Beachmaster Champions!
translation.zh: 成为了新的国际海滩大师杯冠军！

translation.en: -Come on! -Let's go!
translation.zh: -走吧！ -我们上！

translation.en: What are you guys doing?
translation.zh: 你们在干什么？

translation.en: It's not over till we all cross the line.
translation.zh: 比赛要等所有人都穿过终点线才结束

translation.en: Together.
translation.zh: 一起

translation.en: Come on. Let's go.
translation.zh: 起来吧 我们走

translation.en: -[Tyler groans] -[Lizzie] You got it, you got it.
translation.zh: 你能行

translation.en: Look. Look.
translation.zh: 看

translation.en: [all] USA! USA! USA!
translation.zh: 美国队！

translation.en: Good on you, mates.
translation.zh: 祝贺你们 伙计们

translation.en: [all] USA! USA! USA!
translation.zh: 美国队！

translation.en: USA! USA!
translation.zh: 美国队！

translation.en: USA! USA! USA! USA!
translation.zh: 美国队！

translation.en: -[Wayno] Come on! Come on! -[bells jangling]
translation.zh: 来

translation.en: [all] USA! USA! USA! USA! USA! USA!
translation.zh: 美国队！

translation.en: [crying] My streak! My streak!
translation.zh: 我的连胜啊！

translation.en: Team Australia may have won the competition,
translation.zh: 虽然澳洲队赢得了比赛

translation.en: but Team USA, well, they've won our hearts.
translation.zh: 但美国队赢得了我们的心

translation.en: You got it.
translation.zh: 你没问题

translation.en: Tyler! Tyler! Are you okay?
translation.zh: 泰勒！你没事吧？

translation.en: Uh, yeah. I think it's just a bad sprain.
translation.zh: 没事 我想就是重重地扭了一脚

translation.en: I'm sorry. I really thought we could win this.
translation.zh: 对不起 我真的以为我们能赢

translation.en: You gave it your all, kid.
translation.zh: 孩子 你已经拼尽全力了

translation.en: Hey, I'm really proud of you guys.
translation.zh: 嘿 我真的为你们感到非常骄傲

translation.en: Excuse me? Excuse me?
translation.zh: 打扰了

translation.en: You're in charge of Junior Rescue, right? My son Jeffy wants to sign up.
translation.zh: 你是少年救生队的负责人吧？ 我儿子杰菲想报名

translation.en: I wish he could.
translation.zh: 我也希望他能参加

translation.en: Unfortunately, we didn't get enough interest in the program this year.
translation.zh: 但很遗憾 今年对夏令营有兴趣的人不够

translation.en: There's no Junior Rescue.
translation.zh: 没有少年救生队了

translation.en: [mom] Not enough interest?
translation.zh: 有兴趣的人不够？

translation.en: What do you call that?
translation.zh: 那些人是在干什么？

translation.en: They all wanna join?
translation.zh: 他们都想参加？

translation.en: Was it because of our inspirational display of teamwork during the Beachmaster?
translation.zh: 是因为我们在海滩大师杯上 展现了鼓舞人心的团队合作精神吗？

translation.en: What? No. It was because of the crazy rescue you guys pulled off on the freeway.
translation.zh: 什么？不是 是因为你们在高速公路上 上演的绝地救援

translation.en: It was all over the news.
translation.zh: 在新闻上炸开了

translation.en: Jeffy, where did you get that flag?
translation.zh: 杰菲 旗子是从哪儿来的？

translation.en: Jeffy!
translation.zh: 杰菲！

translation.en: What rescue?
translation.zh: 什么救援行动？

translation.en: Dad, the important thing is nobody got hurt.
translation.zh: 爸爸 重要的是没人受伤

translation.en: What do you mean nobody got hurt?
translation.zh: 没人受伤是什么意思？

translation.en: This is gonna be the biggest summer ever.
translation.zh: 这一定会是最有意义的暑假

translation.en: Wait, so we lost, but we won?
translation.zh: 等等 我们输了 却也赢了？

translation.en: That's classic us right there.
translation.zh: 那就是典型的我们

translation.en: -[Dylan] Come on. -[all laughing]
translation.zh: 来吧

translation.en: Okay, Eric, it's time.
translation.zh: 好的 埃里克 时间到了

translation.en: Show us your work.
translation.zh: 把作品展示给大家看吧

translation.en: Eric?
translation.zh: 埃里克？

translation.en: Eric!
translation.zh: 埃里克！

translation.en: Let's all try to remember that art is a subjective medium.
translation.zh: 别忘了 艺术是主观媒介

translation.en: It's a-- A masterpiece.
translation.zh: 这真是…大师之作

translation.en: I have nothing more to teach you. You're done for the summer.
translation.zh: 我没什么要教给你了 你这个暑假的任务已经完成了

translation.en: Neat! See ya!
translation.zh: 不错！再见！

translation.en: ♪ Na-na-na-na-na na-na na-na Na-na-na-na ♪
translation.zh: （马里布海滩救生营）

translation.en: All right!
translation.zh: 好了！

translation.en: Malibu Rescue's newest finest. Come on out, kids.
translation.zh: 马里布救生营最优秀的新成员 下车吧 孩子们

translation.en: Have a great day. They love Valley kids here. [laughs]
translation.zh: 祝你们今天过得愉快 山谷来的孩子很受欢迎

translation.en: Don't be scared. It's great. You're gonna be great. Everything's great.
translation.zh: 别害怕 很好玩的 你们一定会表现出色 一切都很不错

translation.en: All right. Here we go.
translation.zh: 好了 我们开始吧

translation.en: Hey!
translation.zh: 喂！

translation.en: That looks freaking scary!
translation.zh: 那看起来好吓人！

translation.en: I wanna learn that. [giggles]
translation.zh: 我想学学

translation.en: We just need somebody to train us for The Crucible.
translation.zh: 我们只需要有人训练我们 为熔炉考核赛备赛

translation.en: -[Gina] And I can do that. -We're not doing The Crucible.
translation.zh: -我能做到 -我们不参加熔炉考核赛

translation.en: I mean, not The Crucible.
translation.zh: 不是熔炉考核赛

translation.en: Mom, I just had the weirdest dream.
translation.zh: 妈妈 我刚做了史上最奇怪的梦

translation.en: -[Mother] What was it, sweetie? -[screams]
translation.zh: 什么梦 亲爱的？

translation.en: [laughing] That was so bad.
translation.zh: 太差劲了

translation.en: -I can't-- -[Jackie] In your eye.
translation.zh: -我不能… -弄到你的眼睛里了

translation.en: Can you get it for me, Jackie?
translation.zh: 杰奇 你能不能帮我弄出来？

translation.en: Don't worry. We'll get through this together.
translation.zh: 别担心 我们会一起渡过难关

translation.en: Oh, what? 'Cause I can't do it by myself? [laughing]
translation.zh: 怎么？ 因为我自己一个人完成不了吗？

translation.en: -That was nice. -I'm sorry.
translation.zh: -很到位 -对不起

translation.en: Okay, do it again.
translation.zh: 再来一次

translation.en: What's our play? Gas the room?
translation.zh: 该怎么办？往教室里投催泪弹吗？

translation.en: Tranq the T-shirt? Unleash the--
translation.zh: 向T恤发射麻醉镖？放出…

translation.en: I keep saying T-shirt. Teacher. I'm sorry. I'm sorry. I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 我一直都说成T恤 是老师 对不起

translation.en: And people would be like, "Oh, why'd you humiliate those Yanks?"
translation.zh: 大家会说： “为什么要羞辱那些美国佬？”

translation.en: And then I'll be like, "It's not out--"
translation.zh: 我会说：“这不是出…”

translation.en: [stammers] ♪ One more time, yeah ♪
translation.zh: 再来一次 好

translation.en: His face? Oh, so good! Dylan, as well, she looked so torn.
translation.zh: 他的脸？太棒了！ 迪伦看起来也是一副崩溃的样子

translation.en: -Mate, were gonna pop 'em. -I don't know how you came up with that.
translation.zh: -伙计 我们会完爆他们 -我不知道你是怎么想出来的

translation.en: Quick, I need help!
translation.zh: 快来 我需要帮助！

translation.en: I love that we all were just waiting!
translation.zh: 我们都等着她 真是太好玩了！

translation.en: We got this on lock. Come on!
translation.zh: 我们就胜券在握了 来吧！

translation.en: [grunts] Dang, that troop is on fleek. What?
translation.zh: 牛逼！那军队美呆了 什么？

translation.en: Huh? Nothing?
translation.zh: 没什么？

translation.en: -Sick teamwork, bro. -Nice save, dog.
translation.zh: -天衣无缝 哥们 -救得好 小子

translation.en: -Ow! -I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 对不起

translation.en: [slurring] Why do I take the biggest bite every time?
translation.zh: 我为什么每次都要咬那么一大口？

translation.en: [Wayno] Oh, sorry, mate. Want me to turn it back on?
translation.zh: 对不起 伙计 需要我重新打开吗？

translation.en: [all] No!
-[man] Hold on. Can we try-- -[laughing] What just happened?
translation.zh: -等等 我们能不能试着… -刚刚是怎么回事？

translation.en: -[man] B mark. -B mark.
translation.zh: -2号摄像机打板 -2号摄像机打板
